analyzed: katha bhante nāgasena nirodhaḥ nibbāna nti

original: “Sabbe bālaputhujjanā kho, mahārāja, ajjhattikabāhire āyatane abhinandanti abhivadanti
analyzed: sabbe bāla puthujjanā kho mahā rāja ajjhattika bāhire āyatane abhinandanti abhivadanti

original: ajjhosāya tiṭṭhanti, te tena sotena vuyhanti, na parimuccanti jātiyā jarāya maraṇena
analyzed: ajjhosāya tiṭṭhanti te tena sotena vuyhanti na parimuccanti jātiyāḥ jarāya maraṇena

original: sokena paridevena dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi na parimuccanti dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
analyzed: sokena paridevena dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi na parimuccanti dukkhasma ati vadāmi

original: Sutavā ca kho, mahārāja, ariyasāvako ajjhattikabāhire āyatane nābhinandati nābhivadati
analyzed: sutavā ca kho mahā rāja ariya sāvakaḥ ajjhattika bāhire āyatane na abhinandati na abhivadati

original: nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati, tassa taṁ anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato taṇhā
analyzed: na ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati tassa tam an abhinandataḥ an abhivadataḥ an ajjhosāya tiṭṭhataḥ taṇhā

original: nirujjhati, taṇhānirodhā upādānanirodho, upādānanirodhā bhavanirodho, bhavanirodhā
analyzed: nirujjhati taṇhā nirodhā upādāna nirodhaḥ upādāna nirodhā bhava nirodhaḥ bhava nirodhā
jāti nirodhaḥ jāti nirodhā jarā maraṇam soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsāḥ nirujjhanti

original: evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hoti, evaṁ kho, mahārāja, nirodho nibbānan”ti.
analyzed: evam etassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodhaḥ hoti evam kho mahā rāja nirodhaḥ nibbānam ti
